item.title: Charlie Kirk: A Witness of Faith, Truth, and Courage
item.description: For all his meteoric rise, Charlie Kirk never stopped being a good person.

item.description: Remember Christian cakeshop owner Jack Phillips? It would seem that Attorney General Pam Bondi doesn't.

item.title: Anyone Who Blames ‘Both Sides’ After Charlie Kirk’s Murder Is A Liar And Coward
item.description: Unity with people who hate us and want us dead is suicide.
